segments.text: Hello . This is the Stewart Resident .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Mr . Stewart . Who ’ s this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m calling from Bell Canada . We are currently offering a great deal on long distance calling , only $ 17 a month . With this plan you get 500 minutes of long distance calls each month without any additional charges .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . I ’ m not interested in it .
segments.speaker: S1
